page.title: 05Corston The Radnor Arms
page.content: There used to be several pubs in Corston,but now there is only one,{"The Radnor Arms,"}named after the{Earls of Radnor}who used to be important landowners in the area.The building has been a pub for at least 400yrs;there are lots of old stables in the yard at the back. The present landlords are{Mr and Mrs Rudman.}They have been there for three years and enjoy their job,most of the time!They do not own the pub,but are tenants for the{Whitbread brewery.}Most of their customers are not locals, but people passing through the village on the main road.They are particularly busy at lunch times.They haven't changed the pub very much,although they have made the two small bars into one large one.
